findings.title: Logical error
findings.description: The modifier investorChecks() will execute the code only if 30 days passed from first listing date (firstListingDate + 30 days < block.timestamp), but this logic is incompatible with the code under condition statement.

findings.title: No medium severity issues found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any medium severity security issues.

findings.title: No low severity issues found.
findings.description: The audit report did not identify any low severity security issues.

findings.title: Do not forget Return 30 days in EffectDistributionAndLockRelease() function.
findings.description: The modifier investorChecks() will execute the code only if 30 days passed from first listing date, but this logic is incompatible with the code under condition statement.

findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change critical parameters and perform sensitive actions during a certain period.
